    <facet>

    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10267</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Crow Fight (by Liam O'Flaherty) - Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">The Crow Fight (por Liam O'Flaherty) - Cuestionario</string>
            <string language="ga">The Crow Fight (le Liam O'Flaherty) – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Krähe-Kampf (durch Liam O'Flaherty) - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le combat de corneille (par Liam o'Flaherty) - 
jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luta do corvo (por Liam O'Flaherty) - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lotta del corvo (da Liam O'Flaherty) - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πάλη κοράκων (από το Liam O'Flaherty) - 
διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will be able to understand the plot and themes of this story in detail.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes podrán comprender la trama y los temas de esta historia en detalle.</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh daltaí ábalta plota agus téamaí an scéil a thuiscint go sonrach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können, den Plot und die Themen 
dieser Geschichte im Detail zu verstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants pourront comprendre le traçage et
les thèmes de cette histoire en détail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes poderão  compreender em detalhe o 
lote e os temas desta história.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi potranno capire dettagliatamente il 
diagramma ed i temi di questa storia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα είναι σε θέση να καταλάβουν την 
πλοκή και τα θέματα αυτής της ιστορίας λεπτομερώς.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
